title: Angelmeeting: Hall Angel Coordinator
description:
Introduction for Hall Angel Coordinators (HAC)
The first and future annual meeting for new and seasoned Hall Angel Coordinators. On Day 1, we will do the first introduction. if you are new, please come by!Hall Angel Coordinators are the invisible hands behind a hall, besides of the Stage Manager Role, that make sure that everything Hall related especially the people changes (aka Crowd Control) is working and everyone finds a seat. They assist and communicate between all of the Hall Angel Teams in the lecture halls, to guarantee a smooth and entertaining program.
